name: Satan's Crusade
description:
This is for the Highsight Game Jam #1

Use arrow keys to move, Space or Left CTRL to fire. P to pause. Game uses the same rules as the original.

This game took me four days to get this far. I plan on tweaking it at some point. It needs a difficulty ramp. I'll work on that after Jenni (My SO) tests it for me.
